Generate an example specification object

load_spec_ex.Rd

Generate an example specification object

load_spec_ex(file = "spec.yml")

load_proj_ex(file = "project.yml")

file_spec_ex(file = "spec.yml")

file_proj_ex(file = "project.yml")

Arguments

file

an example spec file name

Examples


load_spec_ex()
#>  name    c d unit          short                         source           
#>  C       + - .             commented row indicator       _yspec_lookup.yml
#>  USUBJID + - .             USUBJID                       .                
#>  ID      - - .             ID                            .                
#>  EVID    - - .             event ID                      _yspec_lookup.yml
#>  MDV     - - .             MDV                           _yspec_lookup.yml
#>  SEQ     - + .             SEQ                           .                
#>  AMT     - - mg            amount                        .                
#>  II      - - hours         II                            .                
#>  CMT     - - .             Compartment                   .                
#>  TAFD    - - hours         TAFD                          .                
#>  WT      - - kg            Weight                        .                
#>  EGFR    - - ml/min/1.73m2 eGFR                          _yspec_lookup.yml
#>  STUDY   + + .             Study                         .                
#>  SEX     - + .             SEX                           _yspec_lookup.yml
#>  BQL     - + .             below limit of quantification .                
#>  DV      - - ng/mL         DV                            .                
#>  DV2     - - .             DV2                           .                
#>  HAIR    + + .             HAIR                          .                
#>  CLCR    - - ml/min        creatinine clearance          .                
#>  ALB     - - g/dL          adjusted albumin              _yspec_lookup.yml
load_proj_ex()
#> projectnumber:  ABC101104F 
#> sponsor:        ABC-Pharma 
#> --------------------------------------------
#> datafiles: 
#>  name            description                       data_stem       
#>  DEM104101F_PK   Population PK analysis data set   DEM104101F_PK   
#>  DEM104101F_PKPD Population PKPD analysis data set DEM104101F_PKPD 
#>  DEM104101F_AE   AE analysis data set              DEM0104101F_AE_2
file_spec_ex()
#> [1] "/private/var/folders/xb/hqmfzgl95fq8mx6tjxkzb71r0000gn/T/RtmpM2lyhM/temp_libpath15b747c3ae2ad/yspec/spec/spec.yml"
file_proj_ex()
#> [1] "/private/var/folders/xb/hqmfzgl95fq8mx6tjxkzb71r0000gn/T/RtmpM2lyhM/temp_libpath15b747c3ae2ad/yspec/spec/project.yml"
